official_title: A bill to modify the project for the mouth of the Colorado River, Texas, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Modifies the flood control project for the mouth of the Colorado River, Texas, to provide that a specified diversion channel shall be: (1) constructed and maintained at Federal expense; and (2) for the purpose of fish and wildlife enhancement.

titles.title: A bill to modify the project for the mouth of the Colorado River, Texas, and for other purposes.
